channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Rep. Kingston to Newsmax: Carter a 'Good Man' With Mixed Legacy
item.description: Former Rep. Jack Kingston, R-Ga., told Newsmax on Monday that while former President Jimmy Carter leaves behind a mixed legacy, "no one would say [he]...

item.title: NEW: Donald Trump Calls for Mike Johnson to Remain Speaker With 'Complete and Total Endorsement'
Mexico Has Developed an App to Make Sure Illegals Get Their 'Due Process' in the US
These six states banned or limited DEI at colleges and universities in 2024
item.description: Six states banned the practice of diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) in their educational institutions in 2024 alone.

item.title: Germany accuses Elon Musk of trying to interfere in its national elections
item.description: Musk has billed the right-wing party AfD as the 'last spark of hope' for Germany—prompting outrage from U.S. and German officials.

item.title: Rep. Lawler: Removing Speaker 'Playing With Fire'
item.description: Rep. Mike Lawler, R-N.Y., warned his colleagues about the dangers of removing House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La.

item.title: Jimmy Carter ‘killer rabbit attack’ story highlighted his struggles as president

item.title: US appeals court upholds Trump verdict in E. Jean Carroll defamation case

item.title: Corey Lewandowski to Newsmax: 'Provide Americans Jobs First'
item.description: H-1B visas should be relied on to fill "deficits" in the job market while providing "Americans jobs first," Corey Lewandowski, senior adviser to Presi...

item.title: Rep. Cloud to Newsmax: Congress Has '18 Months to Save the Country'
item.description: Congress only has 18 months to save the United States at this pivotal point in the country's history, but the legislature's current structure does not...

item.title: Smugglers abandon two migrant girls at southern border with note to authorities
item.description: Smugglers left two young children to fend for themselves at the southern border, for them to be rescued shortly after by Texas troopers.

item.title: Immigration Backlog May Hinder Trump's Deportation Plans
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump faces several hurdles with his proposal for mass deportations, including a large backlog in immigration court.

item.title: This May Be the Best Summation of the Complete Failure of the Anti-Trump 'Resistance'
